reviewText: Good comedy! Wish it would've been longer. Will she survive this? Is he for real? You'll just have to watch the fun! I recommend it. Don't pass this over just because it has no English dubs.
ok to watch, plot is nice
I love this anime period. As for shipping and amazon rating . Two thumbs way way up !!!!!
Great story, a twist on romance.

Wolf Girl & Black Prince is a little bit too formula-ized, not enough inside the characters, but is still an excellent choice for the even halfway mature.  It starts with a strong dose of the surreal, slams into the emotional maturity  and behavior of the sixteen year old characters, and then does the unexpected:  It actually tells the story, lets the characters be themselves, and then evolve and mature.

And the Japanese use of the name "Erika" was a delightful touch in making it clear this is today's story, not a rehash of older romantic comedy anime.  That makes it a good choice.

.
Great series! Plenty of humor, and romance. Has a very cute ending as well.

Excellent anime, one of the best I've seen. Got into anime recently from former girlfriend in 2015. If you like Itazura-na-Kiss (2008 version) and Ao Haru Ride, then you will love this anime. Comedy and Love all in one.
This is a great show loved it. I would recommend it.
An awesome pick for the anime fan. It will make u laugh cry mad upset...you will feel like your in her shoes. Cant wait til they make an english voiced dub.
Great series with comedic and romantic plot, you will probably also burst out in tears watching this. The animation and music is also top!
An anima for the books! Definitely one to add to the video library. If you like maid sama this is right up your ally.
